name: aperture
description: AI Partner Programming Toolkit - visibility into codebase complexity and structure

aperture.anthropicApiKey.description: Anthropic API key for AI-powered code analysis

scripts.copy-wasm: cp node_modules/web-tree-sitter/web-tree-sitter.wasm dist/ && cp node_modules/@tree-sitter-grammars/tree-sitter-lua/tree-sitter-lua.wasm dist/ && cp node_modules/tree-sitter-typescript/tree-sitter-typescript.wasm dist/ && cp node_modules/tree-sitter-typescript/tree-sitter-tsx.wasm dist/
scripts.bundle: esbuild src/extension.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/extension.js --external:vscode --format=cjs --platform=node --inject:esbuild-shim.js --define:import.meta.url=importMetaUrl && npm run copy-wasm && npm run copy-defaults
